scripts.build: cd ./client-side && npm run build:single-spa && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: yarn && cd ./server-side && yarn && cd .. && cd ./client-side && yarn && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && yarn && cd ..
scripts.client:addon: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration SingleSpa && cd..
scripts.client:standalone: cd client-side && ng serve --port 4400 --configuration Standalone && cd..
